item.title: Rubber Ducky Twitch Bot
item.description: It's not easy trying to stream code development and sit around talking to yourself for hours on end. I keep finding myself needing a rubber duck to explain things to while no one is active in the chat.

item.title: Goodbye Apple Magic Mouse
item.description: I absolutely love the multi-touch surface of the Apple Magic Mouse 2. It's easy, it's intuitive, and it's natural. Unfortunately, the mouse is wildly non-ergonomic. Almost just as importantly, the battery seems to die, without fail, an hour into my work-day. In order to get any work done, I need a backup $79 Apple Magic Mouse 2.
